title: Remove loading screen entirely

requirements.text: Remove the loading spinner / loading screen from App.tsx entirely. The app must never show any loading or splash state — unauthenticated users see the LoginScreen immediately, and authenticated users with a known profile go directly to the main layout. If a profile fetch is still in-flight after authentication, skip the loading screen and instead render the main layout or the ProfileSetupModal as soon as the state resolves, without any intermediate loading indicator.
acceptanceCriteria: On app load, no loading spinner or splash screen is ever displayed.
Unauthenticated users land directly on the LoginScreen with zero delay.
Authenticated users with an existing profile go directly to the main layout without seeing a loading screen.
Authenticated users without a profile go directly to the ProfileSetupModal without seeing a loading screen.
No spinner, skeleton, or loading text is rendered in App.tsx at any point in the auth/profile flow.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/hooks/ (useInternetIdentity.ts, useActor.ts) or frontend/src/main.tsx.
Do not alter the authentication logic — only remove the loading screen UI.
nonGoals: Adding any new loading or skeleton states elsewhere in the app.
Changing the LoginScreen design or onboarding flow.
